short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your Word documents converted to PDF file format instantly from online utility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert Word to PDF files. 

What does that mean? 

With this extension you can easily convert Word Documents which includes both doc & docx file formats to a PDF file.

Converting WORD to PDF Documents is a handy extension designed for simplicity and convenience. It does not switch your search page & or add any advertising extras as some of the others might do.

This is a simple extension that will convert Word documents to PDF files. The word to pdf conversion method uses the highest quality available so you will not lose quality in the conversion process.

 
With Word to PDF Converter, there's...
• No registration required
• Very easy of use
• Does not switch your search page and or add any advertising extras!

Word to PDF Converter is a simple yet efficient tool to convert any WORD file to the PDF file format. 

You can uninstall the extension at any time.

Version: 1.1
--------------------------
Some bug fixes, improved user experience.

Version: 1.0
--------------------------
Now when you click doc links on any page, you are offered to convert them to pdf files.
